body.name: EURANS Smart Watch 41mm, Full Touchscreen Smartwatch, Fitness Tracker with Heart Rate Monitor & SpO2, IP68 Waterproof Pedometer Watch for Women Men Compatible with iOS & Android Phones
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 5 hrs 49 mins
features: 24 Hours Heart Rate Sleep & SpO2 Monitoring: Eurans smart watch can automatically monitor your heart rate in real-time every 5 minuets and manually detect your SpO2 Saturation. It can also auto-track your sleep via smartwatch and our App and analyze your sleep quality(deep sleep, light sleep and wake up time) to help you develop a healthier lifestyle. Please use the app to connect your phone and smartwatch.

Fitness Tracker with Multiple Sports Modes: This watch has multiple sports modes, including walking, running, bicycle, yoga and more. You can record and check all-day activities data like steps, distance, calories burned, miles walked. This activity multi-sport tracker allows you to check the all days activity data of sport and help you to keep healthy habits(like exercise).

Customizable Dial: Features a 1.4 inch full LCD color screen with 5 stylish watch faces plus 90+ built in-app watch faces for you to choose from. And support customizable watch faces with your favorite pictures and match your style. The interface allows you to understand your health more intuitively by displaying your sports data vividly and in a way as you like, our App is compatible with smartphones that use iOS 11.0/Android 6.0 or above and Bluetooth 5.0 or above.

Smart Notifications: All your messages and notifications will be sent straight to your wrist with intuitive customizable vibrations. You can also check incoming calls and reject them when you are occupied. and you can also fully enjoy other great smart features such as music control, timer settings, find your phone , sedentary reminder and more. (Note: Messages will be sent to your watch only if "Notification Alerts" is enabled in the App)

IP68 Waterproof Smart Watch: Our smart watch is designed to meet the IP68 waterproof standard, allowing you to wear it worry-free while swimming. In addition to its waterproof feature, this smart watch also offers a range of functions including weather forecasts, timers, alarm reminder, sedentary reminder, drinking water reminder, meeting reminder, ect, and even shake-to-take-photo capability.

APP Download & How to connect: [Regarding the app download]: Inside your watch packaging, you'll find a quick guide that specifies the app your watch uses and provides instructions for downloading. Please follow the correct procedure for the download. [As for the connection]: The quick guide contains detailed instructions on how to connect your watch to your phone. Follow the outlined steps, including scanning the provided QR code.

Always at your Service: We prioritize your well-being and satisfaction. If you encounter any issues with our product after receiving it, please don't hesitate to reach out to us through your amazon account. We are committed to providing you with the best possible solution whenever you need assistance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tips: 1. Due to external factors (such as arm hair, tattoos), there may be situations where measurement results are inaccurate or even unavailable. 2. To maintains high accuracy and provide more valid activity data, the fitness tracker will only begin to count steps after walking for a while

Monitoring Your SpO2 Manually detect your SpO2 level to help you keep on top of your health and lead a healthier lifestyle. Warm tip: SpO2 data cannot be considered as a medical-grade test result. 24hr Heart Rate Monitoring With the latest built-in optical sensor, our sports smartwatch can effectively measure your heart rate. It supports automatic detection of pulse frequency (measured every 5 minutes), and can also be switched to manual monitoring mode meaning you can know pulse rate changes in real time. IP68 Waterproof Smartwatch This smartwatch features upgraded waterproof nano-coating, which can prevent the watch against sweat, rain, and other water splashes. Help you to fully enjoy your exercise in all weather. Warm tip: It can't track swimming data.

Call & Message Reminder The smart watch will vibrate and reminder you to view the information on the screen,and you won't miss any important calls or messages from your smartphone. Tips: 1. Please make sure your smart watch connect successfully to your smartphone. 2. It only can hung up the phone call , do not have pick up function. Item Size Our watch straps can be adjusted to fit wrists from 6.1-9.05inch. Important Safety Guide 1. Please do not wear your watch too tight. 2. Clean and dry it before wearing if your watch gets wet. 3. Make sure your skin is dry. 4. Remove your watch regularly to give your wrist a break.

Friendly Reminder: 1. Our app does not require any additional payments. 2. Please follow the steps in the "Quick Start Guide" on the packaging to download the APP correctly. Scanning the QR code through a browser or other methods may lead to other websites due to personal network settings. If you encounter a paid website, please do not click on it, as it is not our website! APP Pairing If the app you downloaded is unable to connect to watch, follow these steps: 1. Refer to the app instruction specified in the "Quick Start Guide" included in the packaging. 2. Follow the instructions in the "Quick Start Guide" to download the app and connect your watch. 3. If both of the above steps are completed but the connection is still unsuccessful, please update the app through Google Play or Appstore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great and inexpensive!
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable, easy to get on and off for a buckle band, about 6 clock face choices, a few tracking choices which is all I need. Besides the watch feature, I use it to track my sleep and heart rate. Both of which surprised me as I am not getting enough sleep. I also really like that it shows me when I woke up or got up in the night. Pretty sure it really is waterproof as I have accidently gotten into the shower with it on twice, took it off quickly but it was very wet. So far its fine. For $20, everyone should have one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought two 41mm and one 44mm for myself, my daughter, and my husband. First off, the 44mm seems to have a different OS than the 41mm. It seems a little better/newer. We all three like them though. Are they super accurate? No, but they're also pretty inexpensive, so they're good enough for our use. I immediately had my husband replace my band. Just look for a 20mm watch band. Any will fit. It took my husband 2 minutes to pop it off and replace it. I have had ot for about a week and a tiny line has appeared on my screen, so I'm ordering a replacement, but honestly, it's barely noticeable, I am just still in the return window, so I figured I may as well. Highly recommend for the price. Oh, and DON'T enable the weather. It has a bug that they are apparently aware of, but it causes the app to continuously crash until you can catch the toggle on the phone screen and turn it off. It would be great to have, but not a deal breaker for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is a good sports watch
reviews.reviewText: It needs to be made clear that the primary purpose of this watch is for sports tracking and phaps weight management. It does have other features such as sleep monitoring however that is not the primary purpose so those punctions are just basic.The watch is nice and has all the features necessary to keep track of heartbeat, O2, calorie intake and burn, type of exercize, etc. My hisband has always claimed that he does not need or like any type of "smart" anything, however, he sure attaches to them easily! He didn't have this watch for 2 weeks before he was asking me how to make a phone call on it - which, of course, it does not do, IT DOES NOT do this. He said he wanted a sports watch, not a smrt phone. But after using this watch for aboout a month, we gave in and he purchaseda smart watch, complete with the ability to check his emails, messages, and make and recieve phone calls.My 15 year old son loves this watch now. He is a football player and truly is only interested in the fitness aspect of the the features available. It is perfect for him! For the price, it is a good deal, I was certain my husband could not have purchased a smart watch for such a low price, and this makes much more sense - and it is still a really good deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great watch/tracker! Battery life is good, I like the the many watch faces that are available to choose from and it’s a great watch for a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars About right for the price...
reviews.reviewText: I bought this on sale for a tenth of what I spent on my last Fitbit. I read many reviews and knew it was basic. First of all, the battery does keep its charge very well since it has way less functionality than a smarter watch. I went ten days on the initial charge, and today I am ten days out again, and will need to charge it tonight. I have not had problems with the charger like some. The heart rate data read my resting heart rate very low, but when I check the rate through out the day, it seems fairly accurate. The step counter may be a little low, but not too far off. The ap is fairly user friendly, and when downloaded from Google Play, I did not have to put in any payment information as some have mentioned. That being said, I never received the email to activate my fitdock account. You have to sync with the ap periodically throughout the day and keep your phone close if you want real time call and message notification. All of these things are expected and forgivable in a watch that cost less than $20. What has me irked today is that the alarms are not going off at the time that I've set them for. For example, I have one set to remind me to clock in at work when I'm miraculously running early. Today it went off 3 minutes late. An alarm I have set to go off every evening did not go off until forty minutes later last night. That I cannot forgive. I never use the music controls or the blood oxygen monitor, so I can't speak to that. I have splashed it while hand washing, and had no trouble, but I never wear it in the shower, or say, washing dishes. I don't know that I would trust it to be waterproof while swimming. Also, there is not option to track swimming anyway, so why would you? I miss the auto tracking of exercise I got with Fitbit, you have to start and stop with the watch, and there are limited options. I miss the elliptical option. I miss the ability to track my water consumption from my watch. It will do for now, but in the future I will see if there is a bit more functional option for less than the Fitbit price. Definitely not for anyone seriously tracking their data. More for casual users. Still, a watch pedometer combo for $15 isn't bad, but you have to have low expectations going in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cost is Less than a Fitbit!
reviews.reviewText: My son kept breaking his expensive Fitbit, so I gave him this one for Christmas. It looks great, does everything he needs that the Fitbit did, and costs way less so when he breaks this one it's not as big of a deal!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the basics.
reviews.reviewText: I like the large face and the simplicity of use. It easily synced with my phone. I only needed it for the basics because I'm participating in another program and wanted to supplement it.This is a good starter tracker for anyone looking to move more without investing in some of the big ticket options.I've had several fitbits and love them, but I'm forever losing them and having the band pop off and never seeing them again. I think this is a better choice for me. If I lose or break it, I won't be bent out of shape.
Used to monitor my daily excercises.
